title: Request for First, Last Names and Government-Issued ID photos of ICE Officials Operating in Oregon, USA (Department of Administrative Services)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Oregon Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

This is a matter of public interest in order to understand if the ICE employees are local citizens who understand the community in which we live, versus employees based in other parts of the country who do not have an understanding of our community. 

This request furthers public interest given, in particular, that numerous individuals claiming to represent ICE have been documented (1) wearing masks, (2) refusing to show government-issued identification corroborating their affiliation with ICE, CBP, USCIS, and/or local law enforcement. Furthermore, there have been incredibly concerning instances of (3) non-LEOs dressing as LEOs who kidnap or attempt to kidnap residents in our community.

As a white, natural-born US-citizen, I respectfully submit this request to ensure the safety of the community where I reside, the State of Oregon, and individuals and communities impacted by these activities.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Lauren M. Kerr

title: Request for First, Last Names and Government-Issued ID photos of ICE Officials Operating in Oregon, USA (Immigration and Customs Enforcement)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

This is a matter of public interest in order to understand if the ICE employees are local citizens who understand the community in which we live, versus employees based in other parts of the country who do not have an understanding of our community. 

This request furthers public interest given, in particular, that numerous individuals claiming to represent ICE have been documented (1) wearing masks, (2) refusing to show government-issued identification corroborating their affiliation with ICE, CBP, USCIS, and/or local law enforcement. Furthermore, there have been incredibly concerning instances of (3) non-LEOs dressing as LEOs who kidnap or attempt to kidnap residents in our community.

As a white, natural-born US-citizen, I respectfully submit this request to ensure the safety of the community where I reside, the State of Oregon, and individuals and communities impacted by these activities.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Lauren M. Kerr
